Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.util

Class LinkedListRecursive<E>

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.util.LinkedListRecursive<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the generic object type
public class LinkedListRecursive<E> extends Object
Represents a LinkedList of elements utilizing recursive methods Can add, get, remove, and set elements and keeps track of the list size
Author:
Chloe Israel, Connor Ferlito

  • Constructor Summary
